dcsl_miabot_driver Documentation

dcsl_miabot_driver: Communicates commands to a Miabot PRO over a serial connection

The dcsl_miabot_driver package contains the dcsl_miabot_driver.py node and the dcsl_miabot_joy node. The former subscribes to the cmd_vel topic with Twist messages, translates these into wheel speed commands, and sends them to the robot over a serial connection. The later subscribes to the joy topic and translates the joystick commands into velocities and angular velocities for the Miabot PRO which are published as Twist messages on the cmd_vel topic.

  • Homepage: http://ros.org/wiki/dcsl_miabot_driver

dcsl_miabot_driver

This package provides an interface to control Miabot PRO robots from Merlin System Corp. Ltd over a serial port connection. It also has a node for controlling the Miabot PRO directly with a joystick.

ROS API

List of nodes:

  • dcsl_miabot_driver.py
  • dcsl_miabot_joy

dcsl_miabot_driver.py

This node subscribes to control inputs of velocity and angular velocity, converts these into the corresponding wheel speeds, and sends the wheel speed commands to the Miabot PRO over a serial connection.

Usage

$ dcsl_miabot_driver.py <path to serial port> [standard ROS args]

ROS topics

Subscribes to (name / type):

  • "cmd_vel/Twist" : linear.x is the desired linear speed in m/s; angular.z is the desired angular rotation rate in rad/s.

Publishes to (name / type): None

dcsl_miabot_joy

This node subscribes to joystick commands, translates these commands into a velocity and an angular velocity command and publishes them on cmd_vel.

Usage

$ dcsl_miabot_joy [standard ROS args]

ROS topics

Subscribes to (name / type):

  • "joy / Joy" : Joy message containing inputs from a joystick.

Publishes to (name / type):

  • "cmd_vel / Twist" : linear.x is the desired linear speed in m/s; angular.z is the desired angular rotation rate in rad/s.

ROS parameters

  • "axis_linear" : Number of the axis of the joystick that should control velocity.
  • "axis_angular" : Number of the axis of the joystick that should control angular velocity.
  • "scale_linear" : The scaling factor used to translate from the [-1,1] range of the axis to the velocity of the robot in m/s.
  • "scale_angular" : The scaling factor used to translate from the [-1,1] range of the axis to the angular velocity of the robot in rad/s.
